channel.title: CBG Studio // MOCKUPS // DATA_STREAM

item.title: 20260227_102408 // cbg studio lifestyle realization a high fidelity lifestyle
item.description: Prompt: prompt: CBG Studio | Lifestyle Realization: A high-fidelity lifestyle photo. The subject is the specific apparel product shown in the provided image. CRITICAL: The product in the new photo must be EXACTLY identical to the base image. You must replicate the pattern, colors, and placement with 100% precision. Context: Obsidian Linkage style. Visual Reference Style: industrial noir techwear aesthetic, high-contrast shadows, clinical warehouse lighting. The shot should be a medium close-up, focusing on the quality and design of the product specimen. model: gemini-3.1-flash-image-preview timestamp: 20260227_102408
